trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse preview expectations | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse preview expectations | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Summary of public preview capabilities and our goals for general availability of SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: Summary of public preview capabilities and our goals for general availability of SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse preview expectations
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse preview expectations

trans-unit.source: This article describes SQL Data Warehouse preview capabilities, and our goals for the service for general availability (GA).
trans-unit.target: This article describes SQL Data Warehouse preview capabilities, and our goals for the service for general availability (GA).

trans-unit.source: We will continuously update this information as we enhance public preview capabilities.
trans-unit.target: We will continuously update this information as we enhance public preview capabilities.

trans-unit.source: Our goals for SQL Data Warehouse:
trans-unit.target: Our goals for SQL Data Warehouse:

trans-unit.source: Predictable performance and linear scalability up to petabytes of data.
trans-unit.target: Predictable performance and linear scalability up to petabytes of data.

trans-unit.source: High reliability for all data warehouse operations, backed by a service level agreement (SLA).
trans-unit.target: High reliability for all data warehouse operations, backed by a service level agreement (SLA).

trans-unit.source: We will continuously work toward these goals before promoting SQL Data Warehouse to general availability.
trans-unit.target: We will continuously work toward these goals before promoting SQL Data Warehouse to general availability.

trans-unit.source: Predictable and scalable performance
trans-unit.target: Predictable and scalable performance

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL Data Warehouse introduces Data Warehouse Units (DWUs) as as a way to measure the computing resources (CPUs, memory, storage I/O) available for the data warehouse.
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL Data Warehouse introduces Data Warehouse Units (DWUs) as as a way to measure the computing resources (CPUs, memory, storage I/O) available for the data warehouse.

trans-unit.source: Increasing the number of DWUs increases the resources.
trans-unit.target: Increasing the number of DWUs increases the resources.

trans-unit.source: As the number of DWUs increases, SQL Data Warehouse runs operations in parallel (e.g. data load or query) across more distributed resources.
trans-unit.target: As the number of DWUs increases, SQL Data Warehouse runs operations in parallel (e.g. data load or query) across more distributed resources.

trans-unit.source: This reduces latency and improves performance.
trans-unit.target: This reduces latency and improves performance.

trans-unit.source: Any data warehouse has 2 fundamental performance metrics:
trans-unit.target: Any data warehouse has 2 fundamental performance metrics:

trans-unit.source: Load rate.
trans-unit.target: Load rate.

trans-unit.source: The number of records that can be loaded into the data warehouse per second.
trans-unit.target: The number of records that can be loaded into the data warehouse per second.

trans-unit.source: We specifically measure the number of records that can be imported, via PolyBase, from Azure Blob Storage to a table with a Clustered Column-Store Index.
trans-unit.target: We specifically measure the number of records that can be imported, via PolyBase, from Azure Blob Storage to a table with a Clustered Column-Store Index.

trans-unit.source: Scan rate.
trans-unit.target: Scan rate.

trans-unit.source: The number of records that can be sequentially retrieved from the data warehouse per second.
trans-unit.target: The number of records that can be sequentially retrieved from the data warehouse per second.

trans-unit.source: We specifically measure the number of records returned by a query on a clustered columnstore index.
trans-unit.target: We specifically measure the number of records returned by a query on a clustered columnstore index.

trans-unit.source: We’re measuring some important performance enhancements and will soon share the expected rates.
trans-unit.target: We’re measuring some important performance enhancements and will soon share the expected rates.

trans-unit.source: During preview we will make continuous enhancements (e.g. increasing compression and caching) to increase these rates and to ensure they scale predictably.
trans-unit.target: During preview we will make continuous enhancements (e.g. increasing compression and caching) to increase these rates and to ensure they scale predictably.

trans-unit.source: High reliability backed by an SLA
trans-unit.target: High reliability backed by an SLA

trans-unit.source: Data Protection
trans-unit.target: Data Protection

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse stores all data in Azure storage using geo-redundant blobs.
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse stores all data in Azure storage using geo-redundant blobs.

trans-unit.source: Three synchronous copies of the data are maintained in the local Azure region to guarantee transparent data protection in case of localized failures (e.g. storage drive failures).
trans-unit.target: Three synchronous copies of the data are maintained in the local Azure region to guarantee transparent data protection in case of localized failures (e.g. storage drive failures).

trans-unit.source: In addition, three more asynchronous copies are maintained in a remote Azure region to guarantee data protection in case of regional failures (disaster recovery).
trans-unit.target: In addition, three more asynchronous copies are maintained in a remote Azure region to guarantee data protection in case of regional failures (disaster recovery).

trans-unit.source: Local and remote regions are paired to maintain acceptable synchronization latencies (e.g. East US and West US).
trans-unit.target: Local and remote regions are paired to maintain acceptable synchronization latencies (e.g. East US and West US).

trans-unit.source: Backups
trans-unit.target: Backups

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL Data Warehouse backs up all data every 4 hours using Azure Storage Snapshots.
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL Data Warehouse backs up all data every 4 hours using Azure Storage Snapshots.

trans-unit.source: These snapshots are maintained for 7 days.
trans-unit.target: These snapshots are maintained for 7 days.

trans-unit.source: This allows restoring the data to up to 42 points in time within the past 7 days up to the time when the last snapshot was taken.
trans-unit.target: This allows restoring the data to up to 42 points in time within the past 7 days up to the time when the last snapshot was taken.

trans-unit.source: By GA, we will you to specify the retention period.
trans-unit.target: By GA, we will you to specify the retention period.

trans-unit.source: You can restore data from a snapshot by using PowerShell or REST APIs.
trans-unit.target: You can restore data from a snapshot by using PowerShell or REST APIs.

trans-unit.source: Snapshots are copied asynchronously to a remote Azure region for added recoverability in case of regional failures (disaster recovery).
trans-unit.target: Snapshots are copied asynchronously to a remote Azure region for added recoverability in case of regional failures (disaster recovery).

trans-unit.source: Query completion
trans-unit.target: Query completion

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse stores data across one or more computing nodes that each store some of the user data and control query execution on that data.
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse stores data across one or more computing nodes that each store some of the user data and control query execution on that data.

trans-unit.source: As part of the massively parallel processing (MPP) architecture, the queries run in parallel across the Compute nodes.
trans-unit.target: As part of the massively parallel processing (MPP) architecture, the queries run in parallel across the Compute nodes.

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse automatically detects and mitigates Compute node failures.
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse automatically detects and mitigates Compute node failures.

trans-unit.source: However, during preview, an operation (e.g. data load or query) may fail due to individual node failures.
trans-unit.target: However, during preview, an operation (e.g. data load or query) may fail due to individual node failures.

trans-unit.source: During preview, we are making continuous enhancements to successfully complete operations despite node failures.
trans-unit.target: During preview, we are making continuous enhancements to successfully complete operations despite node failures.

trans-unit.source: Based on telemetry data, we estimate the current reliability of Azure SQL Data Warehouse at 98%.
trans-unit.target: Based on telemetry data, we estimate the current reliability of Azure SQL Data Warehouse at 98%.

trans-unit.source: This means that, on average, 2 out of 100 queries may fail due to system errors.
trans-unit.target: This means that, on average, 2 out of 100 queries may fail due to system errors.

trans-unit.source: This is not an SLA.
trans-unit.target: This is not an SLA.

trans-unit.source: The probability of a query failing increases with its execution time.
trans-unit.target: The probability of a query failing increases with its execution time.

trans-unit.source: For example, a query that runs longer than 2 hours has a much higher probability of failing than a query that runs less than 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: For example, a query that runs longer than 2 hours has a much higher probability of failing than a query that runs less than 10 minutes.

trans-unit.source: During preview we are improving reliability so that we can guarantee the same level of reliability for operations irrespective of their execution time.
trans-unit.target: During preview we are improving reliability so that we can guarantee the same level of reliability for operations irrespective of their execution time.

trans-unit.source: We will update the expected reliability as we release these enhancements.
trans-unit.target: We will update the expected reliability as we release these enhancements.

trans-unit.source: For general availability, reliability will be backed by a SLA.
trans-unit.target: For general availability, reliability will be backed by a SLA.

trans-unit.source: Service uptime
trans-unit.target: Service uptime

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL Data Warehouse may have up to 4 maintenance events per month to install critical fixes.
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL Data Warehouse may have up to 4 maintenance events per month to install critical fixes.

trans-unit.source: Each event may cause query failures for up to 2 hours.
trans-unit.target: Each event may cause query failures for up to 2 hours.

trans-unit.source: The time will depend on the number of DWUs allocated to the service.
trans-unit.target: The time will depend on the number of DWUs allocated to the service.

trans-unit.source: We will make every attempt to notify these events 48 hours in advance.
trans-unit.target: We will make every attempt to notify these events 48 hours in advance.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.target: [Get started][] with public preview.
